body:
# Ultimate reliability stress(storage) test 

The ultimate goal of this project is to provide flexible and extendable framework for stress testing of different subsystems in IT infrastructure.

Situations, when production-ready, tested and looking good storage subsystem starts to behave strange/incorrect once moved to production, are not exotic from our experience.
To achieve early-detection of hardly-detectable bugs and design flows of storage and IO subsystems, our first aim is to provide muti-platform storage (parallel) stress test as a first stage of the project.
name: URST
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
